---
author:
  name:       "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$author$trname`"
  department: "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$author$department`"
  rank:       "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$author$rank`"
  service:    "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$author$service`"
  degree:     "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$author$currentDegree`"
  afsc:       "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$author$afsc`"
keywords:     "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$document$keywords`"
program:      "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$program`"
degree:       "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$degree`"
title:        "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$document$title`"
sponsor_org:
  title:      "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$sponsor_org$title`"
  subtitle:   "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$sponsor_org$subtitle`"
grad_date:    "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$grad_date`"
date:         "`r format(Sys.Date(), '%d %b %Y')`"
dept_head:    "`r AFIT:::noTouch('metadata.yml')$dept_head`"
output: AFIT:::training_report
